name: Vallarta Gardens 2302

keyAccess_es:
1. Abre la caja de llaves con el c√≥digo 9854. Baja la palanca negra para sacar la llave digital negra.

2. Coloca la llave sobre la chapa electr√≥nica de la puerta para desbloquear.

3. Ya adentro, inserta la llave digital en el slot junto a la puerta para activar la electricidad.

keyAccess_en:
1. Open the key box with code 9854. Pull the black lever to take out the black digital key.

2. Place the key on the electronic door lock to unlock.

3. Once inside, insert the digital key in the slot next to the door to activate electricity.

‚ö†Ô∏è The key is your only access ‚Äî don't forget it when you go out.

localSpots.name: Playa Gemelas

localSpots.desc_en: 15 min by boat from the boardwalk. No tourists, turquoise water. Bring a snorkel.

localSpots.name: Sunset en La Cruz
localSpots.desc_es: Llega a las 6pm al muelle de La Cruz. Pide un mezcal y espera ‚Äî vale todo.
localSpots.desc_en: Arrive at 6pm at the La Cruz pier. Order a mezcal and wait ‚Äî totally worth it.

localSpots.desc_en: The cheapest and most delicious breakfast in Vallarta. Birria on Sundays from 8am.
